explanation: [0-0] On a snowy field, two legs wearing ski suits and stepping on snowboards are shown in the lower left corner. There is a blue tent on the snow in the distance, and several people are standing next to it. The white caption "that feeling after skiing the world's longest rail" appears on the screen.
[0-2] Then the skier slides to the front of the tent, and the person in black clothes inside the tent hugs the legs.
